com.getgero.motionsdk.service
Class GeroAccelerometerService

java.lang.Object
  Service
      com.getgero.motionsdk.service.GeroAccelerometerService

public class GeroAccelerometerService
extends Service

GeroLab accelerometer service. Records raw accelerometer data at 30Hz and uploads to the server to conduct scientific research. Also detects steps.
